alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 2:07AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts around 60 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie County. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
